Join Ig and TCR Data

Source: R/add_clonotype.R
BindIgToTcr.Rd

BindIgToTcr can either join the data from directories or as pre-loaded data.

BindIgToTcr(ig_data, tcr_data, by.dir = FALSE, by.dataset = FALSE)

Arguments

ig_data

Directory or dataset with Ig data
tcr_data

Directory or dataset with TCR data
by.dir

Logical.
by.dataset

Logical.

Value

BindIgToTcr returns TCR joined with Ig data. The "clonotype_id" column is altered to indicate the origin of each clonotype

See also

AddClonotypes

LoadClonotypes
